notepad

Interface Notepad

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleNotepad

    public interface Notepad
    Interface for Notepad data of Note typeNote with methods addNote deleteNote editNote showNotes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNote(Note note)
      Append Note to the end of notepad
      void deleteNote(int index)
      Delete note at index position
      void editNote(int index, Note note)
      Replace new note on place of index note
      void showNotes(java.io.PrintStream outputStream)
      Output the structure of notepad (notes) into Stream

    • Method Detail

      • addNote

        void addNote(Note note)
      throws NotepadOverflowException
        Append Note to the end of notepad
        Parameters:
        note - note which will be added to notepad
        Throws:
        NotepadOverflowException

      • deleteNote

        void deleteNote(int index)
         throws NotepadOutOfBoundsException
        Delete note at index position
        Parameters:
        index - position for deleting
        Throws:
        NotepadOutOfBoundsException

      • editNote

        void editNote(int index,
              Note note)
       throws NotepadOutOfBoundsException
        Replace new note on place of index note
        Parameters:
        index - index for replacing
        note - new note for replacing
        Throws:
        NotepadOutOfBoundsException

        Output the structure of notepad (notes) into Stream
